sentence.Network_en: He had never been able to disbelieve it completely.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从未能够对此予以全盘否定。

sentence.Network_en: There is no reason to disbelieve him.
Why should I disbelieve her story?
sentence.Network_cn: 我为什么要怀疑她的说法呢？

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... disorder 混乱 disbelieve 不信 disproof 反证.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... disproof 反证 disbelieve 不相信 dispraise 贬损，非难.

list.abs: I disbelieve in UFOs ., 我不相信幽.
Please believe yourself but disbelieve the world ., 请相信你自己但不要相信这个世界.
I said " Really ? " in a disbelieving tone , but leaned forward to kiss her anyway .我用怀疑的口气问道：“真的吗？”，并凑过去吻她。
Palestinians therefore utterly disbelieve American protestations of even - handedness ., 因此 , 巴勒斯坦完全不相信美国会所宣称的公正无私.

entry.tran: 不相信，怀疑(某人或某人的话)
entry.def: If you disbelieve someone or disbelieve something that they say, you do not believe that what they say is true.

example.ex: There is no reason to disbelieve him...
He had never been able to disbelieve it completely.
example.tran: 他从未能够对此予以全盘否定。

entry.tran: 不相信(某事存在或有用)
entry.def: If you disbelieve in something, you do not believe that it exists or that it works.

means.word_mean: 1. reject as false; refuse to accept

auth_sentence.content: I can't disbelieve everything that is said.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I can't disbelieve everything that is said.

auth_sentence.content: To disbelieve such a contemporary witness as Sir Thomas More.

auth_sentence.content: Only imbeciles disbelieve what has been proven.

sentences.en: Don’t think I disbelieve your story.
sentences.cn: 别以为我不相信你的话。
